item.title: Cytoskeleton
item.description: Microfilaments Size: 7nm Made from: polymers of actin Roles: Give support and mechanical strength, keep cell shape and enable movement

item.title: Organelles
item.description: ![[Pasted image 20220908112443.png]] Rough Endoplasmic Reticulum (rER/Rough ER) This is a system of membranes containing fluid filled cavities that are connected to the nuclear membrane.

item.title: Plant Cells
item.description: See Chloroplasts, Vacuole and Cell Wall from Organelles Cells are typically viewed under Light Microscopes Biology

item.title: Specialised Animal Tissues
item.description: Squamous Epithelium Made up of specialized squamous epithelial cells, it has a squashed appearance. It is very smooth due to the flat cells that make it up and because it is only one cell thick.

item.title: Stem Cells
item.description: Stem Cells A stem cell is an undifferentiated cell that can differentiate itself Undifferentiated means that it currently performs no function in the body Division of stem cells can cause tumours and cancers (in rare cases) !
